title: The Law Of Sacae
opening: After defeating Arcard, Roy crossed the border and entered the land of Sacae.
After Bern invaded, the Djute clan, the most powerful clan in Sacae, became
its servant.  Most of those clans who stood up against the two joint forces
had already been decimated.  Although the "Silver Wolf" Dayan, the leader of
the Kutolah clan, has been retaliating with guerilla tactics, the situation
was dire.  Sacae had basically become a territory of Bern.
Now, as Roy set foot on the plains of Sacae, the warriors of the Djute clan

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: The Etrurian Army has appeared from the west.

intro.speaker: Monke
intro.line: Good. Lure them into our territory as planned. We shall show them our strength. Have the other clans been notified?

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: Yes. Although there are many clans who are expressing their discontent toward our alliance with Bern, further invasion by Etrurian forces seems to require more attention.

intro.speaker: Monke
intro.line: I see. ...The Etrurian army should be easier to deal with than the Silver Wolf, since the Etrurian Army is a invasion force.

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: The clans will unite to fight against invaders...

intro.speaker: Monke
intro.line: Right. That is the law of Sacae. When we were up against the Silver Wolf, no one aided us because they saw it as conflict between clans.

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: But now that we have Bern behind us, we don’t need their help.

intro.speaker: Monke
intro.line: Exactly. Of course, there are many who don’t like the idea that it is Bern who has actual control of Sacae’s politics.

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: Yes. I hear that there are many clans who agree with the Silver Wolf and joined forces with him.

intro.speaker: Monke
intro.line: He is too stubborn. His clan was defeated, so he should join us. It is not as if he doesn’t know what happens to those who try and fight a head-on battle with Bern.

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: Even large cities like Bulgar have been attacked and taken over by Bern since they resisted.

intro.speaker: Monke
intro.line: From now on, those who are strong enough to manipulate the situation around them will survive, like us. And right now, we must take advantage of the law of Sacae to do so.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Princess Guinevere... We are getting closer to Bern.

intro.speaker: Guinevere
intro.line: ...Yes.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Since we are getting closer, we are claSing with soldiers from Bern more and more often. It will not be long before we engage in full combat with Bern.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: I wish to ask you something before we do.

intro.speaker: Guinevere
intro.line: What is that?

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: I have been hearing rumors...that King Zephiel rose to the throne because he murdered the former king.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: I couldn’t believe it. You tried to stop him even by casting away your nationality. If King Zephiel is such a mad individual as the rumors say, then why did you try so hard to find a peaceful way to end the war?

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Princess Guinevere, I accepted the Fire Emblem not to use it in battle, but to try and find a use for it to end this war peacefully.

intro.speaker: Guinevere
intro.line: Roy...

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Therefore, please tell me the truth about the rumors...

intro.speaker: Guinevere
intro.line: I...I’m sorry. Please...give me some time.

boss.speaker: Monke
boss.line: Yes... That’s right! Closer...closer... Right into our trap!

boss.speaker: Monke
boss.line: Argh...! How could you defeat us... My calculations...were...flawless...

boss.speaker: Monke
boss.line: You are the Silver Wolf’s granddaughter...

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: That was no easy feat.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: But now we have given a telling blow to our strongest enemy in Sacae. Although I’m sure that there are remaining forces somewhere...

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: They must be meeting to plan a retaliation.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Can we find out where they are meeting?

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: Well, I sent out a spy earlier, so he should be returning soon. I shall go check.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Is something wrong, Princess Guinevere?

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: ...I have come to speak about my brother.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: ! ...Are you sure?

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: Yes... I want you to know before we enter Bern...about the tragedies that have occurred. You asked earlier if my brother murdered the former king.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Yes...

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: In short...it is true.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: ! Then King Zephiel indeed killed his own father to seize the throne...

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: No!

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: No? He didn’t kill his father to get the throne?

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: No... Our father was the one who tried to kill Zephiel first.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: What!? Then King Zephiel...

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: He...couldn’t bear the abuse he was taking from our father. And so he...

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: What... Why did...

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: Master Roy! We have found where the enemy is meeting! ...? What is the matter?

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: No...it is nothing. Perhaps later...

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: ...Did I appear at a bad time?

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: No, it’s okay. Where is the meeting place?

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: It is in a city called Bulgar.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Bulgar...I’ve heard of it.

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: It is the largest city in Sacae. Of course, it is now under Bern’s control.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: I see... All right, we’ll be heading there soon.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: ...Why did the former king try to murder his own son...?
